definition: to dig out/to excavate/to scoop out

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format

sentences.english: This article aims to analyze various processing methods for groundwater excavation of the foundation ditch in earthwork construction.
sentences.chinese: 分析土方工程施工中基坑开挖地下水的各种处理办法。

sentences.english: The temporary concrete lining guard wall method was used in excavating vertical shaft.
sentences.chinese: 竖井开挖采用了临时混凝士衬砌护壁措施。

sentences.english: At Futang hydropower station, the cylinder restricted surge tank is 31.
sentences.chinese: 福堂水电站圆筒阻抗式调压井工程开挖直径31。

sentences.english: In this paper, the excavation work of deep foundation pit for the north concrete anchor of south branch of Runyang Bridge is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了润扬大桥南汊北锚碇深基坑工程开挖实例。

sentences.english: The excavation of inclined shaft was always difficult in the construction of Pumped-Storage Power Station.
sentences.chinese: 在抽水蓄能电站中斜井开挖施工历来是一个难点。

sentences.english: The paper will generally analyze and discuss the non-digging pulling pipe construction technology.
sentences.chinese: 本文将针对非开挖拉管施工技术进行整体的分析探讨。

sentences.english: The paper has certain refernce value for actual application of blasting excavation of rock in engineering.
sentences.chinese: 本文对岩石爆破开挖的实际应用具有一定价值。

sentences.english: High speed decoiler with cantilever support, adopting ground recoiling reduces the heavy labor of excavating a pit.
sentences.chinese: 采用高速悬臂开卷，地面放卷，减少开挖地坑之苦。

sentences.english: The excavation of the left-bank diversion tunnel of Longtan Hydropower Project adopts the excavation by layer.
sentences.chinese: 龙滩水电站左岸导流洞开挖采用分层开挖法。

sentences.english: The excavation of the left-bank diversion tunnel of Longtan Hydropower Project adopts the excavation by layer.
sentences.chinese: 龙滩水电站左岸导流洞开挖采用分层开挖法。

sentences.english: Deep-hole blasting was used to excavate soil-rock in some project in Shenzhen.
sentences.chinese: 深圳某土石方开挖工程采用中深孔爆破方式。

sentences.english: Excavate side earth should ensure the stability of the slope and upright.
sentences.chinese: 在开挖槽边弃土时，应保证边坡和直立帮的稳定。

sentences.english: Britain had already dug thousands of miles of canals to connect the different shires .
sentences.chinese: 英国已经开挖了数千里的运河连接不同的郡。

sentences.english: From the top of the unexcavated acropolis, I had a bird's eye view of the whole city.
sentences.chinese: 我从还未开挖的卫城高处俯瞰这整座失落的城市。

sentences.english: Prior to foundation pit excavation, the culvert section shall be prefabricated and carried to position.
sentences.chinese: 基坑开挖前涵节预制并按序运至工点摆放。

sentences.english: Tunnel discharge disaster is a severe problem of Zoumaling tunnel.
sentences.chinese: 重庆走马岭隧道开挖中岩溶涌水灾害是一个突出问题。

definition: to dig into/to cut a mine into
to pilot a ship/to channel water/to draw water (for irrigation)
construction/to carry out construction or large-scale repairs
to cut (a canal, tunnel, well etc)
to install (water pipes, landmines etc) underground
vertical shaft (for mining, ventilation systems etc)
